procedure.name: Delivery
procedure.statement: SELECT NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC

procedure.name: OrderStatus
procedure.statement: SELECT O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? AND ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY O_ID DESC

procedure.name: Delivery
procedure.statement: SELECT NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

procedure.name: OrderStatus
procedure.statement: SELECT O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? ORDER BY O_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

procedure.name: Delivery
procedure.statement: SELECT TOP 1 NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC

procedure.name: NewOrder
procedure.statement: SELECT D_NEXT_O_ID,D_TAX FROM DISTRICT WHERE D_W_ID = ? AND D_ID = ?
SELECT S_QUANTITY, S_DATA, S_DIST_01, S_DIST_02, S_DIST_03, S_DIST_04, S_DIST_05, S_DIST_06, S_DIST_07, S_DIST_08, S_DIST_09, S_DIST_10 FROM STOCK WHERE S_I_ID = ? AND S_W_ID = ?

procedure.name: OrderStatus
procedure.statement: SELECT TOP 1 O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? ORDER BY O_ID DESC

procedure.name: NewOrder
procedure.statement: SELECT d_next_o_id,d_tax FROM district WHERE d_w_id = ? AND d_id = ?
SELECT s_quantity, s_data, s_dist_01, s_dist_02, s_dist_03, s_dist_04, s_dist_05, s_dist_06, s_dist_07, s_dist_08, s_dist_09, s_dist_10 FROM stock WHERE s_i_id = ? AND s_w_id = ?

procedure.name: StockLevel
procedure.statement: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (s_i_id)) AS stock_count FROM order_line, stock WHERE ol_w_id = ? AND ol_d_id = ? AND ol_o_id < ? AND ol_o_id >= ? - 1020 + 1000 AND s_w_id = ? AND s_i_id = ol_i_id AND s_quantity < ?
